nodes.text: Ulfor Bombaasa was a male Human who lived on Coruscant during the Clone Wars, a galactic conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

Ulfor Bombaasa was known to be a regular patron of the Galaxies Opera House, in the Uscru Entertainment District of Galactic City. In 19 BBY, he was present at a performance of Squid Lake following the Battle of Coruscant, which Supreme Chancellor Palpatine and Anakin Skywalker also attended.
Ulfor Bombaasa may have been a relation of the Corellian crimelord Crev Bombaasa, though the surname 'Bombaasa' was common among Humans of the era.
Ulfor Bombaasa was portrayed by James McBryde, who also appeared as an unnamed extra in Dex's Diner in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
